colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(CES RAB GNAS KYI CHO GA KLAGS PAS DON GRUB DGE LEGS KYI GTER CHEN BKRA SHIS RAB RGYAS 'DI YANG SNGA MO NAS GSANG SNGASG RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG RGYAL MTSAN SOGS DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL ZHING, SLAD NAS GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BSTAN PA LHUN GRUB KYIS BYANG PHYOGS HOR GYI YUL GRU CHEN POR BLA MA DANG CHOS SKYONG RIN PO CHE'I BKA' SPYI BOR BLANGS NAS BGROD SKABS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DOGS ZHES NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS RIGS DANG DKYIL 'KHOR KUN GYI BDAG PO KUN MKHYEN BLA MA KHRI RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS GNYIS DANG RIM GNYIS KYI RNAL 'BYOR MTHAR PHYIN PA GSANG CHEN RGYUD SDE'I MNGA' BDAG SRI RDO RJE 'CHANG GI PHYAG LEN MTHONG BRGYUD RGYUD SDE BZHI DGONGS 'GREL DANG BCAS PA'I DON MTHUN PAR MDOR @024B BSDUS NYUNG GSAL DU, ,MDO SNGAGS MANG DU THOS PA'I DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES GONG MA'I YAN DANG MTSUNGS PA'I DPAL RI BO DGA' 'PHEL GYI RI BYED SBYAR BA'I 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
